Package org.flag4j.concurrency

Class ThreadManager

java.lang.Object
org.flag4j.concurrency.ThreadManager
public class ThreadManager extends Object
This class contains the base thread pool for all concurrent operations and several methods for managing the pool.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected static ExecutorService
    threadPool
    Thread pool for managing threads executing concurrent operations.

  • Field Details

    • threadPool

      protected static ExecutorService threadPool
      Thread pool for managing threads executing concurrent operations.

  • Method Details

    • setParallelismLevel

      protected static void setParallelismLevel​(int parallelismLevel)
      Sets the number of threads to use in the thread pool.
      Parameters:
      parallelismLevel - Number of threads to use in the thread pool. If this is less than 1, the parallelism will simply be set to 1.

    • getParallelismLevel

      public static int getParallelismLevel()
      Gets the current parallelism level for the ThreadManager. That is, the number of threads used in the thread pool.
      Returns:
      The current parallelism level for the ThreadManager.

    • concurrentLoop

      public static void concurrentLoop​(int startIndex, int endIndex, IntConsumer function)
      Applies a concurrent loop to a function.
      Parameters:
      startIndex - Starting index for concurrent loop (inclusive).
      endIndex - Ending index for concurrent loop (exclusive).
      function - Function to apply each iteration. Function may be dependent on iteration index but should individual iterations should be independent of each other.

    • concurrentLoop

      public static void concurrentLoop​(int startIndex, int endIndex, int step, IntConsumer function)
      Applies a concurrent strided-loop to a function.
      Parameters:
      startIndex - Starting index for concurrent loop (inclusive).
      endIndex - Ending index for concurrent loop (exclusive).
      step - Step size for the index variable of the loop (i.e. the stride size).
      function - Function to apply each iteration. Function may be dependent on iteration index but should individual iterations should be independent of each other.
